value: 3532 - Mining Machinery and Equipment, Except Oil and Gas Field Machinery and Equipment Summary > MINEWARE PTY LTD (formerly MINE WARE PTY LTD) is an Australian proprietary company. Its operations cover security systems services. The company is not involved in the import or export of goods. MINEWARE PTY LTD is headquartered in Milton, Queensland. It is headed by director Sean Thomas Taylor. For the 2024 financial year, the company reported revenue of $31.91 million. Its net profit totalled $13.54 million. MINEWARE PTY LTD forms part of the services industry sector.
